## \_getRangeWithRelations() function

Get all or given range of models with specified relationships set on model according to model property config set in [ModelStateConfig](./state-model.modelstateconfig.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getRangeWithRelations<TModel extends {}, TState>(state: Immutable<Partial<TState>>, cfg: RelationInclude<TState>, filter?: (value: Immutable<TModel>, index?: number, Array?: unknown[]) => boolean): Immutable<TModel>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | Immutable&lt;Partial&lt;TState&gt;&gt; | State containing model and relationship data |
|  cfg | [RelationInclude](./state-model.relationinclude.md)<!-- -->&lt;TState&gt; | Configuration of which relationships to include |
|  filter | (value: Immutable&lt;TModel&gt;, index?: number, Array?: unknown\[\]) =&gt; boolean | A filter to select a range of models. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;TModel&gt;\[\]

An array of models with relationships applied.
